unnormalised: Arrey yaar, hea mhoinyachi current-achi bill ₹3,500 aili! Fattlea mhoinyan ti fakt ₹2800 asli. Hea ghamaan disbhor AC cholta mhunn asteli, na?
normalised: Arrey yaar, hea mhoineacho current bill tin hazar panchso rupiya ailo! Fattlo mhoino fokot don hazar atthso rupiya aslo. Garmi asa mhunn disbhor A-C chalu asta mhunn astolo, nhi?
text: Arrey yaar, hea mhoinyachi current-achi bill ₹3,500 aili! Fattlea mhoinyan ti fakt ₹2800 asli. Hea ghamaan disbhor AC cholta mhunn asteli, na?
